thread.title: Akshay Kumar is the most favourite co-actor of Katrina Kaif
thread.title_full: Akshay Kumar is the most favourite co-actor of Katrina Kaif

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Akshay Kumar is the most favourite co-actor of Katrina Kaif
text:
Akshay Kumar is the most favourite co-actor of Katrina Kaif 
Mumbai, October 10 (CINEWS): Think about who Katrina Kaif calls her best onscreen accomplice?… 0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 10 (CINEWS): Think about who Katrina Kaif calls her best onscreen accomplice? No, it’s not Ranbir Kapoor. The woman asserted that it was Akshay Kumar with whom she makes the best reel jodi. At the point when gotten some information about her most loved co-star, Katrina said that she and Akshay make the best combine ever! She included sincerely that it might be politically off base to say it however, it’s a certainty and that since they have given some huge hits together, she would love to do another film with him, as reported by DNA. All things considered, who can preclude the accomplishment from securing movies like Namaste London, Welcome and Singh Is above all else. Related Posts
